Source.source:
/* esm.sh - esbuild bundle(twas@2.1.2) deno production */
var t=function(a,o){return o>=a?Math.floor(o/a):0};function s(a,o){o||(o=Date.now());var e=(o-a)/1e3,h=t(60,e),u=t(60,h),f=t(24,u),l=t(7,f),i=t(30,f),c=t(12,i),r=c,n="year";if(e<=1)return"just now";c>0?(r=c,n="year"):i>0?(r=i,n="month"):l>0?(r=l,n="week"):f>0?(r=f,n="day"):u>0?(r=u,n="hour"):h>0?(r=h,n="minute"):e>0&&(r=e,n="second");var d=Math.floor(r);return(d===1?r===u?"an":"a":d)+" "+n+(d>1?"s":"")+" ago"}export{s as default};
